name: Moderat Likvidation
description:
'''Moderat Likvidation''' ({{lit|Moderate Liquidation}}) is a Swedish [[hardcore punk]] band formed in [[Malm√∂]] in 1980 by guitarist Per Berglund and singer Patrik "Fjalle" Wisemark. The band originally existed between 1980 and 1985, but reunited in 2007. In 2009, the band put out a new full-length album, titled ''Mammutation''.

The word "moderate" in the band name refers to the Swedish conservative [[Moderate Party]].
